mutants.code:
from datetime import datetime

def store_and_convert_year(year, new_format):
    iso_format = datetime(year=year, month=1, day=1).isoformat()
    datetime_obj = datetime.fromisoformat(iso_format)
    new_date_format = datetime_obj.strftime(new_format.replace('yyyy', '%Y').replace('mm', '%m').replace('', '%d'))
    return new_date_format

from datetime import datetime

    iso_format = datetime(year=year, month=1, day=1).isoformat()
    datetime_obj = datetime.fromisoformat(iso_format)
    new_date_format = datetime_obj.strftime(new_format.replace('yyyy', '%Y').replace('mm', '%m').replace('dd', ''))
    return new_date_format

from datetime import datetime

def store_and_convert_year(year, new_format):
    iso_format = datetime(year=year, month=1, day=1).isoformat()
    datetime_obj = datetime.fromisoformat(iso_format)
    new_date_format = datetime_obj.strftime(new_format.replace('yyyy', '').replace('mm', '%m').replace('dd', '%d'))
